***#**%*#%*
It is the sincere hope of the writer that consideration of this brief report
may be supplemented by a glance at the complete ANNUAL PROGRESS REPORT OF THE NAEB
TO THE W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDATION, as forwarded on June 22. In it will be found a
fuller and more adequate expression of the fine relationship which exists between
our two organizations, and a statement of some of the plans of the NAEB for the more
adequate publicizing and distribution of the results of our common efforts.
It is our hope that the record of accomplishment which emerges from these com¬
bined reports may be the source of as much satisfaction to the W. K. KELLOGG FOUNDA¬
TION as to the National Association of Educational Broadcasters, whose sincere
thanks are hereby most sincerely expressed.
Respectfully submitted
for the NAEB President
and Board
H. J. Skornia
Executive Director
July 26, 1954
